name: Shared Roots: Wisdom of the Stones
name_original: Shared Roots: Wisdom of the Stones
description:
In SHARED ROOTS: Wisdom of the Stones the player helps a young woman lay down roots in a new land.

Finding herself stranded at the Rollright Stones  - a six-thousand-year-old stone circle in the English Midlands - our heroine learns to use the stones to channel the wisdom of her ancestors. To access this wisdom, she must first solve a series of puzzles. Through playful interactions the player discovers the character's struggle to put her past behind her, lay down roots, and build a life.

SHARED ROOTS: Wisdom of the Stones is a 2.5D isometric puzzle game with bespoke score, based on the music of the region.
